about_the_game:
Expired Meds

Expired Meds is a first person psychological horror game where you traverse an ever shifting maze-like environment, solving puzzles to progress, each one providing clues to how you came to be lost in this mysterious but familiar catacomb

Liminal Horror

You will move through liminal spaces and dark atmospheric environments with nerve shredding immersive sound design, haunted by dark entities and your own untrustworthy visions, where even the smallest detail could reveal the truth about the mystery that envelops you

A walking simulator featuring first person maze elements, puzzles, stalker enemies and chase sequences

Best played in the dark, alone, with headphones

Ideal for fans of games like Layers Of Fear, Madison and Visage

content_descriptors.notes: This game features depictions of mental illness (depression, anxiety, paranoia) and suggestion of medical malpractice

name: Expired Meds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A first-person psychological horror game where you play as a female protagonist, traversing creepy & atmospheric liminal spaces, solving mind-bending puzzles and ever shifting maze environments to uncover the truth about who you are and how you came to be here
